QueryResult.text: select users.id principal_id, users.user_name principal_name, users.first_name first_name, users.middle_name middle_name, users.last_name last_name, users.description description, users.email_address email_address, languages.language_code language_code, assgnd_perm.principal_type, assgnd_perm.object_id, assgnd_perm.object_instance_id, assgnd_perm.permission_id from cmn_languages languages, cmn_sec_assgnd_obj_perm assgnd_perm, cmn_sec_users users where assgnd_perm.principal_type = 'USER' and assgnd_perm.principal_id = users.id union select groups.id principal_id, nls.name principal_name, '' first_name, '' middle_name, '' last_name, nls.description description, '' email_address, nls.language_code language_code, assgnd_perm.principal_type, assgnd_perm.object_id, assgnd_perm.object_instance_id, assgnd_perm.permission_id from cmn_sec_assgnd_obj_perm assgnd_perm, cmn_sec_groups groups, cmn_captions_nls nls where assgnd_perm.principal_type = 'GROUP' and assgnd_perm.principal_id = groups.id and groups.id = nls.pk_id and groups.is_active = 1 and nls.table_name = 'CMN_SEC_GROUPS'
